Python.description: Python introduced me into the world of programming. I have been using it for 3 years now and I am still learning new things about it.

Java.description: Java introduced me to Object Oriented Programming. I have been using it for 2 years now and did a few projects with it.

Front-End.description: Using HTML, CSS and JavaScript for couple months now. This website is a testing ground for me to learn more about it.

Rust.description: It is still a new language for me and I am still learning this language and I am looking forward to using it in the future.

git.description: I have used git wherever it makes sense to do so. I have used it for personal projects and for school projects.

Linux.description: I have used Linux and it was my first operating system. I can navigate through the terminal and I can install programs.
